{{Description|A slender amphibian fish that usually lives in the desert. In order to adapt to the high temperatures and lack of water, they have not only taken on a fairly unique shape, but their reproductive methods have also changed.<br />Though the researchers of the Akademiya firmly deny this, the desert folk believe that the giant life forms within the sands are the mature and complete forms of these creatures following pupation.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Quicksand Eel''' is a [[Wildlife]] found in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]].It normally can be found with its upper body sticking out the sand. After catching one Eel, nearby ones will normally hide and disappear.

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
